question: Which organisation has released the report “International Migration 2020”?
option3: UN Department of Economic and Social Affairs
answer: UN Department of Economic and Social Affairs
explanation:
The UN Department of Economic and Social Affairs has released the report titled “International Migration 2020”.
The report stated that India had the largest diaspora population in the world with 18 million people from the country living outside India in 2020. It also mentions that UAE, USA and Saudi Arabia host the largest number of migrants from India.
